title: Tadej Pogačar or Jonas Vingegaard: Who is going to win the tightest Tour de France in a generation?
content:
With only 10 seconds between them, Pogačar and Vingegaard are almost inseparable – but only one can win. Who will it be?

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar or Jonas Vingegaard: Who is going to win the tightest Tour de France in a generation? on Velo.
author: ahood
